titles.title: Alzheimer's Clinical Research and Training Awards Act of 2000
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for Alzheimer's clinical research and training awards.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 3/16/2000--Introduced. Alzheimer's Clinical Research and Training Awards Act of 2000 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the establishment and maintenance of the Alzheimer's disease Physician-Scientist program to enhance and promote the translation of new scientific knowledge into clinical practice toward the diagnosis, care and treatment of individuals with Alzheimer's disease. Authorizes appropriations.
